title: Site Program Coordinator II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Unity Health Care (Washington, DC) in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was nice and quick. Interviewed with two people in the senior department. About a week later I got my offer. Tried to negotiate my offer and then they gave the job to someone else and tried to place me at a lower position. Promised they would get back to me after the “miscommunication” and ended up ghosting me
Interview Questions: What is your weakness and strength? Tell us about yourself. Generic interview questions

title: Dental Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Unity Health Care (Washington, DC) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Smooth process. The dental team was very nice. They made me feel extremely comfortable. When I started the interview I was nervous. After everyone introduced themselves I felt more at ease.
Interview Questions: Tell me a time when you had to deal with a difficult co worker.

title: Accounting Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Unity Health Care
Interview Descriptions: They interviewed you through HR and then they call you and ask you to come in and do a group interview which is nice because you get to meet a lot of your potential  peers.
Interview Questions: What are you looking for in your next role?

title: Patient Registration Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Unity Health Care
Interview Descriptions: Interview was very straight forward. The managers I met with were professional. From the time I interviewed to the phone call with the job offer, it took about a month.
Interview Questions:
Tell is about yourself. 
What systems are you familiar with?
How’s your commute?

title: Patient Registration Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Unity Health Care (Washington, DC) in Dec 2016
Interview Descriptions:
Two part interview process.

Initial interview was with Mr. Ndaka (no longer works there) very simple questions and very friendly individual. 

Follow up interview was with both Mr. Ndaka and Mrs. Richardson (at the time Health Center Director - no longer there), it was a bit intimidating but the questions asked were more so scenario based.
Interview Questions: How would you handle registering a patient as you are answering/receiving phone calls?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Unity Health Care (Washington, DC) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: took about 2 weeks after I applied, they call and set me up for a interview and they offered me a position about a week later. (they needed people, that why they was moving so fast)
Interview Questions:
Tell us about yourself
why should we hire you
what is your background in the field

title: Patient Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Unity Health Care (Washington, DC) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: it wasn't bad, were the basic situational/behavioral interview questions, I left the interview feeling very confident that I got the job, the hiring manager made me feel like I wanted to start immediately and then I went back to meet with the group who also made me feel comfortable.  have been there for a few months now and still learning the ropes.

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Unity Health Care
Interview Descriptions: The Nurse Managers pick candidates out of the online applications and schedule an interview. They then submit their picks to HR. A background check is completed. If the candidate passes the background check, they are called back in for an offer meeting. Sadly, the process can take up to 3 months.
Interview Questions:
What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Give an example of when you had to handle a conflict and what steps did you take to resolve the issue.
How will you demonstrate the mission and values of the company?

title: Physician Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Unity Health Care (Washington, DC) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a 6 hour tour of approx. 5 Unity Healthcare centers . This was somewhat of a group interview with 5 other candidates. Candidates included MDs, PAs, and NPs. Along the tour we spoke with several different medical directors across the different facilities. There was no one-on-one interview or questioning,
Interview Questions: How comfortable are you with teaching/precepting medical residents?

title: Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Unity Health Care in Mar 2009
